mapper.select: select * from(select s.sp_name, c.cp_name, s.sp_date from tb_space s, tb_company c where s.cp_num = c.cp_num) where sp_date >=trunc(sysdate) and rownum<=3
select s.sp_num, c.cp_name, s.sp_name, s.sp_type, s.sp_address, s.sp_stock, s.sp_rest, s.sp_date from tb_space s, tb_company c where s.cp_num = c.cp_num and rownum <=5 order by sp_num desc
select s.sp_num, c.cp_name, s.sp_name, s.sp_type, s.sp_address, s.sp_stock, s.sp_rest, s.sp_date from tb_space s, tb_company c where s.cp_num = c.cp_num order by sp_num desc
select count(*) from tb_space where sp_num > 0
